title: DirectSell.AI single-page marketing landing with How It Works

requirements.summary: Implement a responsive, English-only single-page landing experience that explains DirectSell.AI and its target users.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the app shows a single landing page (no placeholder/template content).
All headings, body text, buttons, and labels are written in English.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create the app’s single-page marketing layout and render the full landing content (hero, How it works, features, use cases, FAQ, footer) with English-only copy; ensure responsive section spacing/typography throughout.

Create a dedicated LandingPage component containing all landing sections (single-page) and responsive composition; use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Button/Card/Accordion where applicable) to avoid custom complex UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a top navigation and hero section with DirectSell.AI name, value proposition, and a primary CTA that scrolls to How It Works.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section includes DirectSell.AI name, a short value proposition, and a primary CTA button.
Top navigation includes links that scroll to page sections (e.g., How It Works, Features, FAQ).
CTA button scrolls to or focuses the “How It Works” section (or equivalent) on click.

file_operations.description: Create a sticky/top navigation with in-page anchor links (scroll-to-section behavior) for How It Works, Features, Use Cases, FAQ; include brand area for the logo/wordmark. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the hero section with product name, one-sentence value proposition, and primary CTA button that scrolls/focuses the How It Works section; optionally include a secondary CTA (e.g., “View examples”). Use shadcn-ui Button for CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TopNav and HeroSection into the page and ensure their links/CTA target the correct section ids (e.g., how-it-works) with smooth scrolling behavior.

requirements.summary: Build a clearly titled “How it works” section with a numbered 3–6 step flow and copyable outreach prompt examples.
acceptanceCriteria: Section is explicitly titled (e.g., “How it works”).
Includes a numbered step flow with concise descriptions.
Includes at least 3 example prompts/messages a user could copy and adapt.
Examples are written in English and are relevant to customer outreach.

file_operations.description: Create the “How it works” section (with a stable id for navigation) showing a numbered step-by-step flow (3–6 steps) plus at least 3 English example prompts/messages for customer outreach; present examples in a scannable, copy-friendly UI using shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card/Button). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Insert HowItWorksSection after the hero and ensure the primary CTA and nav anchor links scroll to it.

requirements.summary: Add supporting story sections: key benefits/features, use cases, FAQ, and a footer with placeholder links and tagline.
acceptanceCriteria: Features/benefits section lists 3–6 items with short explanatory text.
Use-cases section includes at least 3 distinct scenarios for reaching potential customers.
FAQ contains at least 4 Q&A items and is readable/scannable.
Footer is present and includes at least two placeholder links (Privacy/Terms) and a short tagline.

file_operations.description: Create a Features/Benefits section listing 3–6 items with concise explanatory copy; use consistent card/icon styling via shadcn-ui Card where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a Use Cases section with at least 3 distinct audience scenarios (e.g., solo founders, local services, B2B outbound) focused on reaching potential customers; keep copy English-only and scannable. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create an FAQ section with at least 4 Q&A items; implement with shadcn-ui Accordion for readability and scanning. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a footer with a short English tagline and at least two placeholder links (Privacy, Terms) that do not require additional pages (e.g., non-navigating placeholders or in-page placeholders).
Wire FeaturesSection, UseCasesSection, FaqSection, and Footer into the single landing page and ensure nav anchors include Features/FAQ sections.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent warm, modern visual theme (non-blue/purple primary) across typography, spacing, and component styling.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color palette and typography scale are used across the page.
Buttons, cards, and section headers share consistent styling.
Primary brand colors are not predominantly blue/purple.

file_operations.description: Define global theme tokens/CSS variables and base styles used by Tailwind/shadcn-ui (including a warm primary color such as amber/orange/terracotta and complementary neutrals), ensuring consistent typography and spacing across all landing sections.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (as needed) to support the landing page’s warm brand palette and consistent section typography/spacing utilities while avoiding blue/purple as primary brand colors.

Apply consistent section wrappers, headings, card/button variants, and spacing conventions across all sections; use shadcn-ui components for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add and reference generated static brand images from frontend/public/assets/generated in navigation and hero (no backend serving).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Landing page references these images via static paths.
No backend code is added to fetch/serve these assets.

file_operations.description: Add the generated DirectSell.AI wordmark asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/directsellai-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png so it can be referenced as a static public file.
Add the generated hero illustration asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/directsellai-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png so it can be referenced as a static public file.

Reference the static wordmark image from frontend/public/assets/generated/directsellai-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png in the navigation brand area; ensure it scales responsively. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Reference the static hero illustration from frontend/public/assets/generated/directsellai-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png in the hero layout; ensure responsive behavior and good contrast with the warm theme. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
